1.ruleText: COX - All uniques over 1m WILL be split, perpetrators will be reported to RS justice.

2.ruleText: COX - To scout a raid, a clan member must be a recruit. (You can request to be awarded the recruit rank by showing a minimum of 5 Chambers of Xeric completions to a star-rank.)

3.ruleText: COX - The person who scouts the raid gets the keystone crystal at tightrope.

4.ruleText: COX - 5-man teams or higher you must drop potions before Olm to ensure that everyone has fair supplies; this rule applies only if it was agreed upon before the raid. (This applies for events)

5.ruleText: COX - Don't assume everyone is experienced, be polite and understand that not everyone is Woox.

6.ruleText: TOB - Split all uniques unless otherwise decided, perpetrators will be reported to RS justice.

7.ruleText: CORP - All onyx bolts and sigil drops are split unless the star-rank host says otherwise.

9.ruleText: CORP - During masses, crystal halberds and dragon halberds are prohibited. (unless otherwise stated by the host)

10.ruleText: BANDOS - Boots and shards are donated to the tank.

11.ruleText: BANDOS  - Ask for permission to bring blowpipe/ranged setup.

12.ruleText: BANDOS - Ask for permission to bring dragon claws or other high-DPS special attack weapons.

13.ruleText: ARMADYL - Anyone chinning must pay for their own chins. (Do not remove cost from split)

14.ruleText: ZAMMY - Shards and steam battlestaves are donated to the tank.

15.ruleText: SARA - Shards and Saradomin's light are donated to the tank.
